cast.overview: To build up attendance at their games, the management of a struggling minor-league hockey team signs up the Hanson Brothers, three hard-charging players whose job is to demolish the opposition.
cast.title: Slap Shot

cast.overview: Get ready for a rough-and-tumble comedy that knows how to kick some serious puck!
cast.title: Slap Shot 3: The Junior League

cast.overview: With the original Hanson Brothers still on the same minor league ice hockey team, the Chiefs are sold to a new owner who gives them a female coach and puts them in a league in which they are to be regularly humiliated by an opposing Harlem Globetrotters-like team.
cast.title: Slap Shot 2: Breaking the Ice

cast.overview: B Movie Legend Bruce Campbell is mistaken for his character Ash from the Evil Dead trilogy and forced to fight a real monster in a small town in Oregon.
cast.title: My Name Is Bruce
